unnormalised: The key to a successful campus recruitment drive lies in building strong relationships with the placement cells. Clear communication, understanding the specific skills and expectations of graduating students, and offering competitive compensation packages are crucial. Fresh graduates, especially those from engineering backgrounds, are often offered starting salaries in the range of Rs. 4 Lakhs to Rs. 8 Lakhs per annum, depending on their specialization and performance.
